DOC.brief_summary: The MOMS Partnership aim create `` MOMS Zones '' New Haven neighborhood hard reach family live . These `` MOMS Zones '' two unique feature : ( 1 ) MOMS `` Hub '' deliver centralize mental health family economic success service hardest reach family live New Haven 's impoverished neighborhood , measure actual socio-economic status well access resource ; ( 2 ) neighborhood workforce Community Mental Health Ambassadors ( CMHAs -- mother live New Haven ) . The MOMS Workforce Program MOMS Mental Health Program offer three Hubs .
DOC.brief_title: MOMS Hubs- CT Dept Social Services Block Grant
DOC.detailed_description: The MOMs workforce program involve teaching , coaching , supportive service participant navigate journey sustainable employment pay family-supporting wage . Participants guide individualized progression service design increase employability , increase ability earn high income career-track employment , improve chance retain job advance . The MOMS Mental Health program center around manualized Stress Management Course 8-class group treatment , deliver per week . The course adapt `` The Mother Child Course '' Munoz Le ( 2011 ) population New Haven mother serve MOMS Partnership .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion follow : Participant woman raise child adolescent 18 year age . The child/adolescent may biological offspring custody due adoption foster care . Care arrangement may legally sanction informal , common New Haven family . Thus , eligible participant may sister , aunt , grandmother , female responsible daily care child . Participant currently reside within city limit New Haven , CT . Participant reside within County New Haven , CT October 29 , 2012 . Participant 's income 325 % Federal poverty income . Participant U.S. citizen . Participant 's score CESD > 16 . Exclusion criterion follow : Signs symptom active psychosis active suicidality basis exclusion study . Lack proficiency English .
